title: New Dialysis Suite Commissioned
summary: A six-bed dialysis unit is now open, reducing travel time for renal patients in the Savannah Region.

title: Sawla Midwives Receive National Award
summary: Our maternal health team was recognised for excellence in safe delivery practices at the Ghana Health Awards.

title: Community Health Outreach
summary: Mobile clinics screened over 2,000 residents for hypertension and diabetes during our annual outreach.
